info.interactivesystems.gamificationengine.api

Class PresentApi

  • java.lang.Object
    • info.interactivesystems.gamificationengine.api.PresentApi

  • @Path(value="/present")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public class PresentApi
extends Object
    Players in a gamification application can send presents to each other, whereby one or more players can be a recipient. These presents can be a small image or a short text message which contains for example a little praise. A Board serves a player to send and to store presents in terms of a short text message or an image. The difference between these two messages is as the name suggests, that the text message contains a short text and the image message an image. To archive the presents they can be moved to an additional list. It is possible to get for one player all her/his text messages or all messages with a small image that were created. Furthermore all new presents of player can be requested as well as the accepted and archived presents. All denies presents were removed from the in-box.

    • Method Detail

      • createTextMessage

        @POST
 @Path(value="/textMessage")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response createTextMessage(@QueryParam(value="playerId") @NotNull @ValidPositiveDigit(message="The sender id must be a valid number")
                                                                                        String senderId,
                                                                                        @QueryParam(value="receiverIds") @NotNull @ValidListOfDigits
                                                                                        String receiverIds,
                                                                                        @QueryParam(value="content")
                                                                                        String content,
                                                                                        @QueryParam(value="apiKey") @ValidApiKey
                                                                                        String apiKey)
        Creates a new text message as a present in a gamificated application, so the method generates the Present-id. The organisation's API key is mandatory otherwise a warning with the hint for a non valid API key is returned. By the creation the player-id of the sender and a list of the receiver ids are needed to be passed. Additionally the content of the text message has to be passed. It is checked, if the ids of the players are positive numbers otherwise a message for the invalid number is returned.
        Parameters:
        senderId - The player who sends the text message as a present to other players. This field must not be null.
        receiverIds - The player ids of the present's receivers. This field must not be null.
        content - The content of the text message.
        apiKey - The valid query parameter API key affiliated to one specific organisation, to which this text message belongs to.
        Returns:
        Response of TextMessage in JSON.

      • createImageMessage

        @POST
 @Path(value="/imageMessage")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response createImageMessage(@QueryParam(value="playerId") @NotNull @ValidPositiveDigit(message="The sender id must be a valid number")
                                                                                          String senderId,
                                                                                          @QueryParam(value="receiverIds") @NotNull @ValidListOfDigits
                                                                                          String receiverIds,
                                                                                          @QueryParam(value="imagePath") @NotNull
                                                                                          String imagePath,
                                                                                          @QueryParam(value="text")
                                                                                          String textMessage,
                                                                                          @QueryParam(value="apiKey") @ValidApiKey
                                                                                          String apiKey)
        Creates a new image message as a present in a gamificated application, so the method generates the Present-id. The organisation's API key is mandatory otherwise a warning with the hint for a non valid API key is returned. By the creation the player-id of the sender and a list of the receiver ids are needed to be passed. These id have to be separated by commas. Additionally the image path of the image has to be passed. The format of the image has to be .jpg or .png. It is checked, if the ids of the players are positive numbers otherwise a message for the invalid number is returned.
        Parameters:
        senderId - The player who sends the image message as a present to other players. This field must not be null.
        receiverIds - The player ids of the present's receivers. This field must not be null.
        imagePath - The path of the image. This field must not be null and the format of the image has to be .jpg or .png.
        textMessage - A short text comment that belong to the image.
        apiKey - The valid query parameter API key affiliated to one specific organisation, to which this image message belongs to.
        Returns:
        Response of ImageMessage in JSON.

      • getCurrentBoardMessages

        @GET
 @Path(value="/{playerId}/boardMessages")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getCurrentBoardMessages(@PathParam(value="playerId") @NotNull @ValidPositiveDigit(message="The player id must be a valid number")
                                                                                                          String playerId,
                                                                                                          @QueryParam(value="apiKey") @ValidApiKey
                                                                                                          String apiKey)
        This method returns all already accepted messages of a specific player's current presents. If the API key is not valid an analogous message is returned.
        Parameters:
        playerId - The id of the player who owns the board with the current presents. This field must not be null.
        apiKey - The valid query parameter API key affiliated to one specific organisation, to which the messages belongs to.
        Returns:
        Response as List of Presents in JSON.

      • send

        @POST
 @Path(value="/{presentId}/send")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response send(@PathParam(value="presentId") @NotNull @ValidPositiveDigit(message="The present id must be a valid number")
                                                                                String presentId,
                                                                                @QueryParam(value="apiKey") @ValidApiKey
                                                                                String apiKey)
        With this method one present is sent to all specified receivers. So the present is stored in each inbox of the receivers.
        Parameters:
        presentId - The path parameter of the present's id that should be sent to the receivers.
        apiKey - The valid query parameter API key affiliated to one specific organisation, to which this present belongs to.
        Returns:
        Response of Present in JSON.

      • acceptPresent

        @POST
 @Path(value="/{presentId}/accept/{playerId}")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response acceptPresent(@PathParam(value="presentId") @NotNull @ValidPositiveDigit(message="The present id must be a valid number")
                                                                                                      String presentId,
                                                                                                      @PathParam(value="playerId") @NotNull @ValidPositiveDigit(message="The player id must be a valid number")
                                                                                                      String playerId,
                                                                                                      @QueryParam(value="apiKey") @ValidApiKey
                                                                                                      String apiKey)
        With this method a player accepts a present. So the present will be moved from her/his inbox to the list of the player's current presents.
        Parameters:
        presentId - The present that is accepted. This field must not be null.
        playerId - The id of the player who accepts the present. This field must not be null.
        apiKey - The valid query parameter API key affiliated to one specific organisation, to which this present belongs to.
        Returns:
        Response of Present in JSON.

      • denyPresent

        @POST
 @Path(value="/{presentId}/deny/{playerId}")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response denyPresent(@PathParam(value="presentId") @NotNull @ValidPositiveDigit(message="The present id must be a valid number")
                                                                                                  String presentId,
                                                                                                  @PathParam(value="playerId") @NotNull @ValidPositiveDigit(message="The player id must be a valid number")
                                                                                                  String playerId,
                                                                                                  @QueryParam(value="apiKey") @ValidApiKey
                                                                                                  String apiKey)
        With this method a player denies a present. So the present will be deleted from her/his inbox of the board.
        Parameters:
        presentId - The present that is denied. This field must not be null.
        playerId - The id of the player who denies the present. This field must not be null.
        apiKey - The valid query parameter API key affiliated to one specific organisation, to which this present belongs to.
        Returns:
        Response of Present in JSON.

      • archivePresent

        @POST
 @Path(value="/{presentId}/archive/{playerId}")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response archivePresent(@PathParam(value="presentId") @NotNull @ValidPositiveDigit(message="The present id must be a valid number")
                                                                                                        String presentId,
                                                                                                        @PathParam(value="playerId") @NotNull @ValidPositiveDigit(message="The player id must be a valid number")
                                                                                                        String playerId,
                                                                                                        @QueryParam(value="apiKey") @ValidApiKey
                                                                                                        String apiKey)
        With this method on present is archived. So the present is moved from the player's list of current presents to an list of archived presents on the board.
        Parameters:
        presentId - The present that is archived. This field must not be null.
        playerId - The id of the player who archived the present. This field must not be null.
        apiKey - The valid query parameter API key affiliated to one specific organisation, to which this present belongs to.
        Returns:
        Response of Present in JSON.

      • deletePresent

        @DELETE
 @Path(value="/{id}")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response deletePresent(@PathParam(value="id") @NotNull @ValidPositiveDigit(message="The present id must be a valid number")

                                                                               @QueryParam(value="apiKey") @ValidApiKey
                                                                               String apiKey)

        Parameters:
        presentId - Required path parameter as integer which uniquely identify the Present.
        apiKey - The valid query parameter API key affiliated to one specific organisation, to which this present belongs to.
        Returns:
        Response of Present in JSON.

      • deleteArchivedPresent

        @DELETE
 @Path(value="/{id}/deleteArchived/{playerId}")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response deleteArchivedPresent(@PathParam(value="id") @NotNull @ValidPositiveDigit(message="The present id must be a valid number")
                                                                                                                 String presentId,
                                                                                                                 @PathParam(value="playerId") @NotNull @ValidPositiveDigit(message="The player id must be a valid number")
                                                                                                                 String playerId,
                                                                                                                 @QueryParam(value="apiKey") @ValidApiKey
                                                                                                                 String apiKey)

        presentId - Required path parameter as integer which uniquely identify the Present.
        playerId - The present is removed from the player's board.
